0100001011101101 0010100000111001 1 -> sum: 0110101100100111, cout: 0
1011010010101101 1011100010001111 0 -> sum: 0110110100111100, cout: 1

0011000000001011 1010101010000011 1 -> sum: 1101101010001111, cout: 0

0111111111111111 1000000000000001 1 -> sum: 0000000000000001, cout: 1
